summary: Build and deploy an updated app footer to match a provided screenshot layout, while keeping the app’s beige/black theme and using the project’s name/text.
known_issues: Build/deploy failed with error: "app creation didn't work out" when generating the new footer; user requested retry.

existing_features.title: Rebuild the existing footer component to match the structure and spacing of the uploaded screenshot: three main columns (left: brand name + short description; middle: “Quick Links” list; right: “About” heading + short paragraph), followed by a single bottom copyright line.
Ensure the updated footer is integrated in the global layout without changing routing or authentication logic, and that the app builds successfully after the previous failed build attempt.

new_feature_requests.summary: Rebuild footer to match screenshot layout (three-column structure), keep beige/black theme, and replace screenshot text with the project’s name/text.

projectName: Rebuild footer to match uploaded screenshot layout (beige/black theme)
